modeldriver¶

nexoclom.modeldriver(inputs, npackets, overwrite=False, compress=True)[source]¶

Starting point for running the model INPUTS:

inputs: Input object npackets: Total number of packets to run for this simulation overwrite: If True, delete existing files for this set of inputs
